A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Felt like a Disney film\, cheesy lines\, slapstick humor during intense scenes. Throws away all the anticipation from TFA\, no back story on Snoke. Rey is a nobody and is somehow this amazing force user\, and now they are saying Jedi/Sith are done and everyone can be a force user - that is so lame. Stick to the original plot from the first 7 movies. Very disappointed.
